legendaryActions.name: Misty Step
legendaryActions.description: The hag teleports up to 30 feet to an unnocupied space it can see. If there is currently an active Illusory Duplicate, it can teleport as well.

legendaryActions.name: Claws
legendaryActions.description: The hag makes one claws attack

legendaryActions.name: Cast A Spell
legendaryActions.description: The hag casts one of her At Will spells

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: Dancing Lights, Minor Illusion, Vicious Mockery
3/day: Magic Missile
1/day: Sleep

actions.name: Claws
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft, one target
Hit: 13 (2d8 +4) slashing damage

actions.name: Illusory Appearance
actions.description:
The hag covers herself and anything else she is carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humaoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to a physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel were rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

actions.name: Invisible Passage
actions.description: The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her conentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

actions.name: Summon Aid (recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The hag summons one of the following allies to help it: 3 Flumphs, 2 Swarm of Bats, or 1 Swarm of Insects
